attributes.additional_details:
The area is already over populated, there is already massive strains on all the Schools and GP surgery’s that serve there too.
There is no need for anymore unnecessary environmental destruction, please don’t just dismiss this .
There must be waste land further out of an already over populated area , that can accommodate this proposal.
attributes.background: Approach LBH planning and get the whole thing stopped

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for, and local planning decisions are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you are concerned about a planning application in your area you could raise your concerns with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
